text: Careful, He Might Hear You is a 1983 Australian drama movie directed by Carl Schultz and was based on the 1963 novel of the same name by Sumner Locke Elliott. It stars Wendy Hughes, Robyn Nevin, Nicholas Gledhill and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Careful, He Might Hear You
